about_the_game:
SOK PRO OFF is not an actual DLC. All functionality is already in the game!

You no longer need to install this add-on.
All offline functionality has been added to the main SOK PRO game.

The latest update already has all the offline features
detailed_description:
SOK PRO OFF is not an actual DLC. All functionality is already in the game!

You no longer need to install this add-on.
All offline functionality has been added to the main SOK PRO game.

The latest update already has all the offline features
name: SOK PRO OFF

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel / AMD 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 620
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Supported: 2560x1440 / 1920x1080 fullscreen. Windowed: 1920x1080 / 1600x900 / 1366x768 / 1280x720 / 1024x576 / 854x480 / 640x360 / 432x240

short_description: SOK PRO OFF is not an actual DLC. All functionality is already in the game!
